channel.title: Pages on Jack of All Trades
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Jack of All Trades

item.title: About
item.author: 2e0byo@gmail.com (John Morris)
item.description: Gardener Joe—that great and renowned figure—had a mouth like an ‘O’, but of what interest was that alongside his wheelbarrow full of surprises? This website resembles a wheelbarrow in several ways: it is no doubt full of (rather poor) surprises, generally of the how-not-to-do-things variety, it is all balanced rather precariously on one wheel and could pitch over any moment and make a mess, and it is liable to be forgotten for months and then overworked on a hot summer’s afternoon.
